title: Rip My League

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Apologies for the delayed response, I've been rather busy with work lately.

If you're continuing to experience this issue, please run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
I have tried almost all of the options and tops on that page. Reinstalling once more, if it doesnt work than fuck league man.

Apologies for such a delayed response, I've been super busy with work again.

Are you able to try [reinstalling your game](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) for me, does that resolve your issue?
I repaired my launcher, it worked once.
